name: GGJ2018_WaveBoys
description:
Make in GGJ2018 at ShangHai VitrellaCore Education site by 

Room505 team [Uson , Mos, Ryan, Dante]

游戏制作于GGJ2018上海晶核站

*** Desc 简介 ***

Two boys with force-control gear. Overcome the difficulties with transmitting stuffs together.

俩浪孩子获得了一把能操作物件的武器，通过操控和传递物件来合力通关。

*** Control 操作 *** 

(Loco co-op game, a controller is required to control 2P character!!!)

(热坐合作游戏，需要一个手柄操作2P角色)

1P : Keyboard&Mouse  [ wsad - move ; mouse - aim ; j - pull ; k - push ; space - jump ; c - reset]

2P : Controller [ left thumbstick - move ; right thumbstick - aim ; left shoulder - pull ; right shoulder - push ; left/right trigger - jump]

*** Remarks 备注 ***
